FooterMenu.name: DENTAL OK-VIP
FooterMenu.address_detail: 180 Cao Lo Street, Ward 4, District 8, Ho Chi Minh City

IntroducePage.des1: OK-VIP Dentistry is a highly specialized dental system chain with a nationwide chain of clinics, achieving many achievements in orthodontics and implants, dedicated to the treatment philosophy of taking care of a healthy and beautiful smile from the root, prioritizing customer health.
IntroducePage.des2: Parkway Dental achieved Top 02 in Southeast Asia in terms of Invisalign clear braces, Top 01 in Vietnam in terms of total number of braces. As a strategic partner of the Straumann Group, it ranks No. 1 in the world in terms of market share and in terms of implant technology, consultation techniques and surgical guidance chutes.
IntroducePage.des3: With nationwide coverage, a team of doctors who uphold integrity, dedication to the profession and dedication to customers, we are currently at the forefront of dental digitalization: scanning and storing digital medical records, making treatment protocols by video, etc support treatment planning with artificial intelligence AI and personalize treatment solutions using CAD/CAM (3D printer).
IntroducePage.content4: caring for a healthy, beautiful smile
IntroducePage.des4: With the goal of becoming a chain of dental clinics for every Vietnamese family, we aim to bring a new standard in dentistry to customers, so that everyone can master their oral health, spread a healthy smile from the root and preserve a healthy smile throughout their lives.

AppointmentPage.name: Họ và tên
AppointmentPage.vservice: Chưa có dịch vụ nào được chọn. Chọn dịch vụ(nếu có)!
